message.content:
<teammate-message teammate_id="team-lead" summary="Mandatory identity roll call — all agents respond">
MANDATORY IDENTITY CHECK — ALL TEAM MEMBERS.

Every single agent on this team must respond. State:

1. **Your name** (as assigned when you were spawned)
2. **Your role** (one sentence — what is your job on this team?)
3. **Your task ID(s)** if you know them

This is not optional. Every agent must respond individually. Do NOT respond on behalf of anyone else.
</teammate-message>

input.content:
1. **Name:** epistemology-expert (system agent ID), functioning as **translator-2** per my Profile.md assignment
2. **Role:** Bilingual Chinese-English philosophical translator for the 境集 (Jing Ji) essay collection — the second translator instance, continuing from where the first translator left off.
3. **Task ID:** #19 (translator-2, status: in_progress)

Note: There is an identity mismatch — my system routing ID is "epistemology-expert" but my Profile.md and task assignment (#19) designate me as "translator-2." I have been operating as translator-2 throughout this session, with the full translator Memo.md, draft translations, and expert consultation results loaded. Please clarify which identity I should use going forward.
